presentationColumns.name: Actual Elapsed Time (Min) ESSAgg

presentationColumns.description: Elapsed Time of Flight, in Minutes

presentationColumns.name: Arr Delay (Min) ESSAgg
presentationColumns.description: Difference in minutes between scheduled and actual arrival time. Early arrivals set to 0.

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.# of Flights ESSAgg

presentationColumns.name: Arr Delay as % of Flight Time ESSAgg
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.Arr Delay as % of Flight Time ESSAgg
presentationColumns.description: Percent of flights that arrive on time. Note: If you select Origin as a category, you get percent of flights that depart from those airports and arrive on time.

presentationColumns.name: Delay Perf % (0=Ontime,  >0=Late) ESSAgg
presentationColumns.description: Percent of flights that arrive on time. Note: If you select Origin as a category, you get percent of flights that depart from those airports and arrive on time.
